marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Description of the Island of St. Christophers (With a correct whole sheet Map)
Accompanies AN ACCURATE MAP of the ISLANDS of ST. CHRISTOPHERS and NEVIS in the WEST INDIES and describes the history of the islands.

This material is provided for research, education and private use only. Commercial use of this work is strictly prohibited. Attribution for use must be provided as follows: "Digital reproduction from the W. K. Morrison Special Collection of the J. B.
